DOC.brief_summary: Mid-urethral sling ( MUS ) represent gold standard treatment female stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) . Second generation trans-obturator sling ( TOT ) proven effective retropubic tension-free vaginal tape ( TVT ) few major complication . A third generation MUS insert single vaginal incision ( SIS ) become mean overcome significant post-operative groin pain . Novel type SIS robust adjustable anchor mechanism assure adequate long-lasting attachment obturator membrane ( OM ) . Objective study compare inside-out TOT innovative fixation SIS randomize control trial patient undergo primary surgery urodynamic SUI .
DOC.brief_title: Trans-obturator Mid-urethral Sling Single-incision Sling Women With Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: Objective study compare inside-out TOT ( Gynecare TVT Obturator System , Ethicon ) innovative fixation SIS ( Ophira , Promedon ) randomize control trial patient undergo primary surgery urodynamic SUI . A prospective randomize control trial ( RCT ) perform one tertiary referral urogynecology center January 2012 thru December 2013 . Study include woman pure predominant urodynamic SUI confirm cystometry positive standardize cough stress test ( CST ) urinary bladder fill 250 ml lithotomy position . Study carry Caucasian Czech ( central European ) population . A study power analysis calculate expect objective cure rate minimum 80 % patient group , false non-match rate ( alpha ) 0.05 , false match rate ( beta ) 0.10 . A minimum sample size 42 patient require group .
DOC.criteria: Women pure predominant urodynamic stress urinary incontinence confirm filling cystometry positive standardize cough stress test ( CST ) urinary bladder fill 250 ml lithotomy position . patient predominant urge incontinence patient intrinsic sphincter deficiency ( MUCP < 20 cmH2O ) pelvic organ prolapse ( POPQ > 2 ) previous urinary incontinence surgery previous pelvic organ prolapse surgery presence pelvic organ pathology .
